snippet.title: Neon Genesis Eva DOOM Mod
snippet.description:
Project EvaDoom Modification for Doom II

Join the Discord to hang out with the creators here-
https://discord.gg/uzCtGu8

Mod DB Download Page here
EARLY PLAYABLE DEMO NOW AVAILABLE!!
https://www.moddb.com/mods/neon-genesis-evadoom

The Majority of textures and sounds in this video AND the available demo have been extracted from the Nintendo 64 Evangelion Game and modified to work within the Doom engine.
Due to popular demand, the project is now planned for a Total Conversion and Gameplay Modification, re-creating scenes, locations and battles as seen in the original series! Keep an eye on the Mod DB page for updates!
